data.message: Now if you could only make a way of editing permissions and deleting games and apps you no longer want because they misled you, then you would be on to something FB.

replies.message: Hey Kathy. You can remove any app or game you've downloaded in your account settings. To learn how to remove an app or game you've added, please visit our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/170585223002660 -Hailey
Thanks Hailey. I tried through the help center prior to making that comment and it was not very clear. I will try again. Thanks again. I love these videos -- it makes FB a little more "human".

Go directly to all the apps you have enabled here: https://www.facebook.com/settings?tab=applications&section=all
Two options: 
1) Delete any you don't like.
2) Block any that you strongly dislike. :D
WOW thanks for this info and thanks Kathy for asking. :)
